# Cause Fear (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Emotion Spells|emotion]], [[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Adept Spells|Adept 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Mesmerist Spells|Mesmerist 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature with 5 or fewer HD

**Duration:** 1d4 rounds or 1 round; see text

**Saving Throw:** Will partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 252

The affected creature becomes [[Frightened|frightened]]. If the subject succeeds on a Will save, it is [[Shaken|shaken]] for 1 round. Creatures with 6 or more HD are immune to this effect. *Cause fear* counters and dispels *[[Remove Fear (Spell)|remove fear]]*.

**GM Note**

Added emotion descriptor per *Ultimate Magic*.
